content.raw:
@mhallak : Sorry to hear that you're still having this problem.  So far we've been unable to reproduce it.  Can you please do two things:

1. Verify that you're running Gazebo 1.7.2 by running:

        dpkg -l gazebo

    The last line should say:

        ii  gazebo                                      1.7.2-1~precise                           3D dynamics simulator for robotics

1. Send your broken `state.log` to drcsim-support@osrfoundation.org.  You've sent us broken logs before, which was very helpful; now we'd like to get one produced using Gazebo 1.7.2, including the use of `gzlog stop` before shutdown.
content.html:
@mhallak : Sorry to hear that you're still having this problem. So far we've been unable to reproduce it. Can you please do two things:

  1. Verify that you're running Gazebo 1.7.2 by running:

    dpkg -l gazebo

    The last line should say:

    ii  gazebo                                      1.7.2-1~precise                           3D dynamics simulator for robotics

  2. Send your broken state.log to drcsim-support@osrfoundation.org. You've sent us broken logs before, which was very helpful; now we'd like to get one produced using Gazebo 1.7.2, including the use of gzlog stop before shutdown.
